462:1: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapaṃ tāṃścānyān sthavirān mahāśrāvakānāmantrayāmāsa-sādhu sādhu mahākāśyapa|
462:2: sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtān guṇavarṇān bhāṣadhve|
462:3: ete ca kāśyapa tathāgatasya bhūtā guṇāḥ|
462:5: yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ paryanto'dhigantumaparimitānapi kalpān bhāṣamāṇaiḥ|
462:8: yaṃ ca kāśyapa tathāgato dharmaṃ yatropanikṣipati,
462:14: sarvadharmārthavaśitāprāptaḥ sarvadharmādhyāśayaprāptaḥ sarvadharmaviniścayakauśalyajñānaparamapāramitāprāptaḥ sarvajñajñānasaṃdarśakaḥ sarvajñajñānāvatārakaḥ sarvajñajñānopanikṣepakaḥ kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ||
462:15: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvantastṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo nānāvarṇā nānāprakārā oṣadhigrāmā nānānāmadheyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātāḥ parvatagirikandareṣu vā|
462:18: saṃchādya ca sarvatra samakālaṃ vāri pramuñcet|
462:21: sarve te tato mahāmeghapramuktādvāriṇo yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayamabdhātuṃ pratyāpibanti|
462:22: te caikarasena vāriṇā prabhūtena meghapramuktena yathābījamanvayaṃ vivṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāmāpadyante,
462:24: te ca pṛthak pṛthagū nānānāmadheyāni pratilabhante|
462:25: ekadharaṇīpratiṣṭhitāśca te sarve oṣadhigrāmā bījagrāmā ekarasatoyābhiṣyanditāḥ|
462:26: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate|
462:28: tathā tathāgato'pyutpadya sarvāvantaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ svareṇābhivijñāpayati|
462:29: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātumavacchādayati,
462:30: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata evaṃ śabdamudīrayati,
462:36: ahamimaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ samyak prajñayā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmi sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī|
462:39: tatra kāśyapa bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti|
462:40: atha tathāgato'pi teṣāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryaparāparavaimātratāṃ jñātvā tāṃstān dharmaparyāyānupasaṃharati,
462:41: tāṃ tāṃ dharmakathāṃ kathayati bahvīṃ vicitrāṃ harṣaṇīyāṃ paritoṣaṇīyāṃ prāmodyakaraṇīyāṃ hitasukhasaṃvartanakaraṇīyām|
462:42: yayā kathaya te sattvāḥ dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavanti,
462:46: śrutvā ca taṃ dharmaṃ vigatanīvaraṇā bhavanti|
462:47: anupūrveṇa ca sarvajñadharmeṣvabhiyujyante yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthānam||
462:48: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃchādya samaṃ vāri pramuñcati,
462:50: yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthāmaṃ ca te tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vāryāpibanti,
462:52: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
462:53: sarvaḥ sa dharma ekaraso yaduta vimuktiraso virāgaraso nirodharasaḥ sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaḥ|
462:54: tatra kāśyapa ye te sattvāstathāgatasya dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śṛṇvanti dhārayanti abhisaṃyujyante,
462:55: na te ātmanātmānaṃ jānanti vā vedayanti vā budhyanti vā|
462:57: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tān sattvāṃstathā jānāti,
462:70: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tatra pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣadarśī yathā ca darśī teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmiṣu sthitānāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamānām|
462:71: so'haṃ kāśyapa ekarasadharma viditvā yaduta vimuktirasaṃ nirvṛtirasaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ nityaparinirvṛtamekabhūmikamākāśagatikamadhimuktiṃ sattvānāmanurakṣamāṇo na sahasaiva sarvajñajñānaṃ saṃprakāśayāmi|
462:72: āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā yūyaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ tathāgatasya na śaknutha avataritum|
462:75: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamāna imā gāthā abhāṣata—
462:79: rahasyaṃ cāpi dhārenti na ca bhāṣanti prāṇinām||2||
462:80: durbodhyaṃ cāpi tajjñānaṃ sahasā śrutva bāliśāḥ|
462:81: kāṅkṣāṃ kuryuḥ sudurmedhāstato bhraṣṭā bhrameyu te||3||
462:86: so ca vārisya saṃpūrṇo vidyunmālī mahāmbudaḥ|
462:92: iha yā kāci medinyāṃ jātā oṣadhayo bhavet|
462:95: parvate kandare caiva nikuñjeṣu ca yadbhavet||10||
462:109: yāsāṃ ca yad yādṛśakaṃ ca bījam|
462:135: na kaści vidveṣu na rāgu vidyate||21||
462:137: premā ca doṣaśca na me kahiṃcit|
462:162: anyā ca madhyā mahatī ca oṣadhī
462:198: drumā pi vā te ca mahādrumā vā
462:225: te śrāvakāḥ sarvi na enti nirvṛtim|
462:228: punaraparaṃ kāśyapa tathāgataḥ sattvavinaye samo na cāsamaḥ|
462:229: tadyathā kāśyapa candrasuryaprabhā sarvalokamavabhāsayati kuśalakāriṇamakuśalakāriṇaṃ cordhvāvasthitamadharāvasthitaṃ ca sugandhi durgandhi,
462:230: sā sarvatra samaṃ prabhā nipatati na viṣamam,
462:231: evameva kāśyapa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñajñānacittaprabhā sarveṣu pañcagatyupapanneṣu sattveṣu yathādhimuktiṃ mahāyānikapratyekabuddhayānikaśrāvakayānikeṣu saddharmadeśanā samaṃ pravartate|
462:232: na ca tathāgatasya jñānaprabhāyā ūnatā vā atiriktatā vā yathāpuṇyajñānasamudāgamāya saṃbhavati|
462:236: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat-yadi bhagavan na santi trīṇi yānāni,
462:237: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne'dhvani śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptiḥ prajñapyate?
462:238: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat-tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ samāsu mṛttikāsu bhājanāni karoti|
462:244: atha ca dravyaprakṣepamātreṇa bhājanānāṃ nānātvaṃ prajñāyate|
462:245: evameva kāśyapa ekamevedaṃ yānaṃ yaduta buddhayānam|
462:246: na dvitīyaṃ na tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate||
462:247: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat-yadyapi bhagavan sattvā nānādhimuktayo ye traidhātukānniḥsṛtāḥ,
462:248: kiṃ teṣāmekaṃ nirvāṇamuta dve trīṇi vā?
462:251: tena hi kāśyapa upamāṃ te kariṣyāmi|
462:254: sa evaṃ brūyānna santi suvarṇadurvaṇāni rūpāṇi,
462:260: athānye puruṣāstasya jātyandhasya puruṣasya purata evaṃ vadeyuḥ-santi suvarṇadurvarṇāni rūpāṇi,
462:266: sa ca jātyandhaḥ puruṣasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na śraddadhyāt,
462:270: tasyaivaṃ syāt-tasya puruṣasya pūrvapāpena karmaṇā vyādhirutpannaḥ|
462:272: te sarve caturvidhāḥ-vātikāḥ paittikāḥ ślaiṣmikāḥ sāṃnipātikāśca|
462:273: atha sa vaidyastasya vyādhervyupaśamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarupāyaṃ cintayet|
462:276: santi tu himavati parvatarāje catasra oṣadhayaḥ|
462:283: atha sa vaidyastasmin jātyandhe kāruṇyamutpādya tādṛśamupāyaṃ cintayet,
462:289: ārāgya ca kāṃciddantaiḥ kṣoditāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
462:297: sa pratilabdhacakṣurbahiradhyātmaṃ dūre āsanne ca candrasūryaprabhāṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahān sarvarūpāṇi ca paśyet|
462:306: te taṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ-kevalaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā cakṣuḥ pratilabdham|
462:311: tamenamevaṃ vadeyuḥ-yadā tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa antargṛhaṃ niṣaṇṇo bahiranyāni rūpāṇi na paśyasi,
462:313: nāpi te ye sattvāḥ snigdhacittā vā drugdhacittā vā|
462:315: bherīśaṅkhādīnāṃ śabdaṃ na prajānāsi, na śṛṇoṣi|
462:321: tatsādhu bhoḥ puruṣa yadandhakāraṃ tatprakāśamiti saṃjānīṣe,
462:323: atha sa puruṣastān ṛṣīnevaṃ vadet-ka upāyaḥ,
462:324: kiṃ vā śubhaṃ karma kṛtvedṛśīṃ prajñāṃ pratilabheya,
462:326: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasya puruṣasyaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ-yadīcchasi,
462:332: araṇye vasan ekāgracitto lokatṛṣṇāṃ prahāya pañcābhijñāḥ prāpnuyāt|
462:337: iti hi kāśyapa upamaiṣā kṛtā asyārthasya vijñaptaye|
462:345: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati|
462:347: tathāgatastu karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātukānniḥsṛtaḥ piteva priye ekaputrake karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātuke'vatīrya sattvān saṃsāracakre paribhramataḥ saṃpaśyati|
462:350: dṛṣṭvā ca jānāti-amī sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛtvā mandadveṣāstīvrarāgāḥ,
462:356: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgata upāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānāni deśayati|
462:357: tatra yathā te ṛṣayaḥ pañcābhijñā viśuddhacakṣuṣaḥ,
462:358: evaṃ bodhisattvā bodhicittānyutpādya anutpattikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante||
462:365: yathā catasra oṣadhayastathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitanirvāṇadvāraṃ ca draṣṭavyam|
462:368: evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayitvā sattvā avidyāṃ nirodhayanti|
462:370: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati|
462:371: evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ na kuśale tiṣṭhati na pāpe||
462:377: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate-na santyapare dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ|
462:383: sa utpannabodhicitto na saṃsārasthito na nirvāṇaprāpto bhavati|
462:384: so'vabudhya traidhātukaṃ daśasu dikṣu śūnyaṃ nirmitopamaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnamarīcipratiśrutkopamaṃ lokaṃ paśyati|
462:385: sa sarvadharmānanutpannānaniruddhān abaddhānamuktān atamondhakārān naprakāśān paśyati|
462:388: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
462:392: sarvasattvān vinayate na conā naiva cādhikā||46||
462:393: yathā kulālo mṛdbhāṇḍaṃ kurvan mṛtsu samāsvapi|
462:396: mṛdamekāṃ sa gṛhṇāti kurvan bhāṇḍāni bhārgavaḥ||48||
462:397: yādṛk prakṣipyate dravyaṃ bhājanaṃ tena lakṣyate|
462:409: jātyandhe tu mahāvaidyaḥ kāruṇyaṃ saṃniveśya ha|
462:413: dantaiḥ saṃcūrṇya kāṃcittu piṣṭvā cānyāṃ tathāparām|
462:417: evaṃ sattvā mahājñānā jātyandhāḥ saṃsaranti hi|
462:429: maharṣayo yathā tasmai karuṇāṃ saṃniveśya vai|
462:434: so adyāpi na jānāti kutastvaṃ vetsyase'lpadhīḥ||67||
462:436: taṃ śrotuṃ na samartho'si prāgevānyaṃ vidūrataḥ||68||
462:438: te na śakyaṃ tvayā jñātumabhimānaḥ kuto'sti te||69||
462:439: krośamātre'pi gantavye padavīṃ na vinā gatiḥ|
462:440: mātuḥ kukṣau ca yadvṛttaṃ vismṛtaṃ tattadeva te||70||
462:441: abhijñā yasya pañcaitāḥ sa sarvajña ihocyate|
462:450: upāya eṣa buddhānāṃ vadanti yadimaṃ nayam|
462:452: tryadhvajñānamanantaṃ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ|
462:454: bodhicittaṃ ca ye cānye dharmā nirvāṇagāminaḥ|
462:463: na caitān prekṣate nāpi kiṃciddharmaṃ vipaśyati||81||
462:466: sarvadharmāḥ samāḥ sarve samāḥ samasamāḥ sadā|
